question.text: You have 4 treats, but you can only eat one every 30 minutes. You finish them in... 10 seconds??

answer.text: You can finish them in 1.5 hrs (90 minutes) because you can have one right away.

question.text: A circle has just one side.

answer.text: A circle has two sides, an inside and an outside.

question.text: There are seven apples and you take three of them. You have NINETY-NINE APPLES!

answer.text: No, you have three apples. You took three of them. No idea who has the other four.

question.text: If I am a number who has a couple of friends, which number am I?
Name the favorite dessert of a math teacher.
